name: Draymond Green’s Super D Punch
description:
Just in time for the the playoffs, you can now experience all the action of playing as the #1 player from America’s #1 team, Draymond Green of the Golden State Warriors. Will they threepeat? Only if you live up to the challenge.

Game controls: Arrows to move; Space bar = punch

Credits:

Written by: Sam Johnson (www.theothersamueljohnson.com)

Programmed by: polaris84

Art by: Ben Rittmann
